item.title: ‘South Park’ Lives: Paramount Inks New Deal With Creators, Library Moving to Paramount+

item.title: ‘South Park’ to Get 50 New Episodes as Trey Parker, Matt Stone Reach Five-Year Deal With Paramount; Entire Series to Stream on Paramount+
item.description: The great “South Park” standoff of ’25 is over. Series creators Trey Parker and Matt Stone have officially extended their overall deal with Paramount Global for a further five years.

item.description: Amid a streaming rights battle, the platform’s license to stream the series internationally has expired, sources tell The Hollywood Reporter.
